ygData.subject: Re: Can someone identify what this is for....
ygData.msgSnippet: All I know is it s a quest item in Freeport, but as for the NPC s name or loc, no idea.  I ve been carrying one around for about a week too.  My brother knows
ygData.messageBody:
All I know is it's a quest item in Freeport, but as for the NPC's name or
loc, no idea. I've been carrying one around for about a week too. My
brother knows the NPC, but I have no ideas.

If your on Cazic-Thule, ask Adjyktyv, he's an enchanter and he can probably
tell you exactly who to go see.

Wenaddar of Cazic-Thule


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dark Sharp [SMTP:darksharp@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 1:52 AM
> To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ-Quest] Can someone identify what this is for....
>
> Unintelligble Cantrip got it off a Orc in E. Commonlands...anyone know
> what is it for?
